Group of 15 or more?

Contact our Group Travel team directly for a tailor made solution for your group

Group Booking Terms and Conditions

Because you are making a Group Booking, there are additional Terms and Conditions that apply. Please read them and click 'I Accept' below to continue with your booking

General Group Booking Terms

By making a group reservation through Hostelworld.com you agree to the following terms and conditions as set by Hostelworld.com and as set by the hostel in question.

  • In order to make a group reservation on Hostelworld.com it is necessary to pay a deposit. The balance is due directly to the hostel according to their payment conditions.
  • The booking deposit is non-refundable.
  • Please note that any cancellations must be notified directly to the hostel at least 24 hours in advance of your scheduled arrival date, unless otherwise stated in the hostel's conditions.
  • Hostelworld.com are not responsible for changes or amendments to your reservation once it has been processed. All correspondence with regard to changes to your booking need to be dealt with directly with the hostel.
  • Cancellations for reservations must be made directly with the hostel and must conform with the individual hostels cancellation policy (see below)
  • It is your responsibility to pay the balance of your accommodation cost to the hostel in accordance with their payment conditions (see below). Failure to do so may result in your reservation being cancelled by the hostel.
  • Individual hostels may have special booking conditions relating to group stays, please read the hostel booking conditions carefully before making your reservation.

Hostel Specific Terms & Conditions

The remainder of the amount due will be charged to your credit card 4 weeks prior to arrival. Should numbers or room selection change, the per person deposit times the number of people who actually travelled will be deducted from the total accommodation charge levvied by the hostel.

Cancellation / No Show & Reduction in Numbers Policy

Cancellation policy for high season(from March 10th to October 31st):

No show: full charge
Cancellation and reduction in numbers: less than 2 weeks, penalty 50% of the total amount.

Cancellation and reduction in numbers: less than one week, penalty 100%;

Cancellation policy for low season(from Nov.1st to March 9th):

No show: 1 night accomodation charge.

Cancellation and reduction in numbers: less than 3 days,
1 night accomodation charge.

Note: the high season cancellation policy will be apllied for all festive days, Xmas, New Y's Ive, Ester.


Additional Terms and Conditions

1)In the past we have experienced some problems with underage drinking and also indecent behaviour of guests in groups, therefore the hostel reserves the right to determine the departure date during the reserved period.
2) All damages to the facilities caused by a member/s of the group must be paid for in full.

The following group types are not accepted by this hostel: Junior / Primary School If you have misrepresented the type of group you are booking for, your booking may be cancelled by the hostel."

Any cancellations resulting from agreement to these terms and conditions under false pretences will result in loss of deposit.

8.5
Fabulous 8476 Total Reviews
  • Wonderful Location
  • Marvellous Staff
  • Excellent Cleanliness
We love this Hostel!

It gets our thumbs up for consistently high guest reviews.

Hostelworld says

Hostel Alessandro Palace & Bar is most highly-rated by our visitors for its location and staff. This hostel is located near the trains, metro and buses of Termini station, which Hostelworld guests say is 'great when you have a morning transfer to the airport'. Guest have said 'you can meet a lot of amazing people at the hostel's bar downstairs or on the roof garden'.
Show less Show more

Property Description

Winter PROMO! (Nov 2017- Mar 2018)
Book 3 or more nights-stay & receive:
* 1 free breakfast
* Possible discounts:
- 7€ on night-out party (from 25€ to 18€)
- 3€ on tours (Vatican, Colosseum, etc)
- 15% off for 1 day schooter rental
- 10% at the Bramble Bar & Kitchen (on food & bevarages for dinner) + Welcome Prosecco
Note: Reservations necessary at the hostel reception in order to apply these discounts.
Disclaimer: The Winter PROMO is offered only to individual guests not for groups and not applicable to the following days: 24,25,26, 29,30,31/Dec/2017, 01/Jan/2018, 30,31/Mar/2018
--------------------------------------
Weekly bar events & specials
Day: Mon, Wed and Fri
- Aperitivo with Italian Pizza!
- Karaoke time
- Beer-pong tournament
Day: Tue, Thu and Sat
- Happy hour
- Party night-out: 9:30PM-late
Day: Sun
- Happy hour extended
- Happy corona hour
- Karaoke for a shot
---------------------------------------
alessandro palace & bar is:
- close to termini station. it takes only 5 minutes on foot from termini to the Alessandro Palace.
- open for 24 hours. (check-in 3pm / check-out 10am).
after recent renovation (in Spring 2017), the hostel offers:

services
- free wifi (in bed rooms and common space)
- free city maps
- bed linen included in price
- free coffee/tea for all day in lounge room

also featured:
-convenience
- 24 hours reception (=late arrivals welcome)
- vending machines with drinks, snacks, travel goods and toiletry
- common kitchen (available from 1pm to 10pm)
- common bathrooms in case ones in dorm rooms are occupied
- elevator

- all room with bathroom and air-conditioned
- Breakfast (4€) between 7:30am – 10:30am (including cereals, fruits, jam butter, bread, juices, milk, juice, coffee and tea, etc.)
- Discount for dinner at the Bramble bar &kitchen right next door
- Lockers in all rooms (FREE to use but PLEASE bring your own padlock - size 25-32-38!)
-rental towels (2€+deposit 3€)

fun and entertainment
- on site bar and roof top terrace for drinks at reasonable price! (Terrace open during summer)
- social lounge with sat TV
- weekely events (see at top of this description for latest events!)
security
- luggage storage room with coin lockers (2€ for max of 12hours) before check-in/after check-out
- secure keycard system
- video security system
- fire proof doors & smoke sensors

enviroment
- international atmosphere by travellers from all over the word.

IMPORTANT: CITY TAX (3,5€ per person per night) will be extra. It is NOT included in the reservation price. Please pay it upon arrival in cash.

Location
Our convenient central location means we're close to supermarkets and historic sites like the Colosseum, Roman Forum, San Pietro in Vincoli, the Basilica Santa Maria Maggiore, the shopping mecca of Spanish Steps, Trevi Fountain and the classy Via Veneto and more.
Please note:
Through online form, we do not accept group bookings with over 9 people .

WE wish you a pleasant stay and enjoy your HOSTEL EXPERIENCE!
Show less Show more

Hostel Alessandro Palace & Bar says

What really puts our hostel ahead of the rest is our facilities...we've got an onsite bar with drinks at reasonable prices, a roof garden, air conditioning in all the rooms, Wi-Fi in all areas of the hostel and a unique Roman style of architecture inside. For fun our guests usually like to meet people and have a drink at our bar. Most of our guests are 20 to 35 years of age-flashpackers who have style when they travel-and we try to take care of all our guests equally.
We're in a convenient location near Termini Station, so our guests can get all around the city very quickly. When people ask me where they should visit in Rome, it's hard to decide which one to recommend, but I think I'd have to say the Colosseum.
    Alessandro, Proietti
Show Less Show More

Things to Note
Credit cards accepted.
Towel rental available.

Important: CITY TAX (3,5€ per person per night) will be extra. It is NOT included in the reservation price. Please pay it upon arrival in cash.


Check-in: from 15:00 to 3:00am
Check-out: from 3:00 to 10:00

Check-in: 3pm. Late arrivals are accepted. You're welcome to leave your luggage with us if you arrive early. Please make sure to inform us of any changes of your arrival time. Don't worry if you've got a late flight coming in our reception is open 24 hours.

Lockout is from 10am to 3pm to facilitate the cleaners.

Airport pickup is available upon request. For 1-4 persons with up to four suitcases it's from 57 Euro (in one car). For 5-8 persons with one suitcase per person the price is from 15 Euro per person. The stated price is minimum tariff; the fee varies depending on flight arrival time and airport (Fiumicino / Ciampino).

Pick-up must be arranged at least three days prior to arrival as we need to check availability. For more details please inquire by email after booking.

Please note that group reservations of more than 8 people are not accepted through the online reservation system.

For cases in which this term is not respected, we reserve the right to cancel the reservation/s without any notice. The paid deposit is not refundable.

We are unable to send fax or letters for visa document applications to embassies and/or consulates.

Payment is due upon arrival.

We have a 48hr cancellation policy.

Late cancellations and no-shows shall be charged the equivalent of the first night accommodation.

Cancellations or alterations are only accepted by email or fax. Phone cancellations/alterations are not accepted.

Please note:
We do not accept group bookings for Easter.

Cancellation Policy

Latest Review

" I booked this hostel after leaving Colosseum Footprints (booked, did not stayed because the place was horrible). In comparison Alessandro was much better, huge room and there’s a bar, many events going on everyday, although cleanliness needs to improve. My blanket had black spots all over and moles in it, shower was dark and you need to constantly press the button in order to let the water run, also the hot and cold water wasn’t consistent, I got burned twice. "

- jesssophia6336
